channel.title: Rune-X-Scape! Reborn!
channel.description:
[center][b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Jdia9eg.png[/img]
[img]http://i52.tinypic.com/2lsv09i.gif[/img]
Play now at www.rune-x-scape.com
Hey everyone many of you know of two types of rune-x-scape
We had a rune-x-scape ran by chris for a couple of months which had a player base of 20-30 players daily.
Then we had a rune-x-scape ran by domain .net or .org which was a deathlypvpz base but edited.
Pk-Legacy has bought out rune-x-scape domain and files which will now be professional coded together which hopefully will make a successful server
ingame content of both servers will be added over the next couple of weeks which will be applying as system updates
Play now at www.rune-x-scape.com
[img]http://i.picasion.com/pic39/82723cb790ade14678a81b7a7777190c.gif[/img]
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/3242f2f70ddba1c06ff232ca56b1d318.png[/img]
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/186cf250f30936021b5936a6cbadf03a.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/btvqsTN.png[/img]
[img]https://i.ytimg.com/vi/NW8Uw04XFLY/hqdefault.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/338ffd32be6576c0f9e59528527a6cdf.png[/img]
Fixes Mute system - easy fix but many PI's dont have :S Zamorak Godwars bosses - animations work so they no longer flicker Made client window non resizable fixed remove X dupe method fixed some memory leak issues (not 100% but is much better) - See printscreen fixed some of items equiping to wrong slot and showing incorrectly (pvp armours) fixed the logout glitch at duel arena where it would spam the server when you logged out
Additions Kalphite queen with working animations working points system (slayer/pking/boss killing to earn points) working tokul shops kill/death ratio with counters in the quest tab quick chat fully working where it doesnt say "0 hans" when you have no task Edgeville home with all alters and shop added working zamorak brews + magic potions and custom "combat potion" re-coded commands file, added lots of new commands and neatnd the file up however still needs some tidying fully working exp lamps use "agility top" on agility npc's for exp bonuses (can be bought with agility tickets) added 3 agility courses (gnome, barbarian and wilderness) added lots of teleports
FULL SCREEN CLIENT A Agility Shop with interfaces for tickets. All Skills Level To 125 Working Auras in-game Fixed Minigames Better Combat Working MoneyPouch! Summoning Orb With Draining Fixed Cheat Egine Dupe! custom items with 711 model header [Server] Announcement when you get 99 [Server] Announcement when you receive a rage drop Custom GFX and Anime for some basic commands Lottery, [Lottie] Added 2 Starters Per Ip Added Custom Log-ins when Staff Log in 120 Dungeoneering Server AutoSave No Bank Lag Player Titles Auto-Server Save Re-Wrote Mage Added in dice command for Donator+ New Interfaces Comp Cape requireing all 99s. New Superdonator Extreme Donator Rank Better Duel Arena New ::Help method Better Prayer Better Eco 2b Ticket Exchange Nice Player Titles With a good Interface Player Titles for most ranks Player Cliping Summoning Working Fixed Charms Better Spirit Shields (Not showing lines like regualr ones) Staff Tab saying if staff is online or not. Most Sinlge and Double doors working the way they need to Awesome Donator Benifits Fixed Freezing in Wise old man And LOADS OF MORE THINGS!
[/b][/center]

item.title: Rune-X-Scape! Reborn!
item.dc:creator: @haviland4 haviland4
item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

DevilXsummoner:

You ruined the name ‘Rune-X-Scape’… If anyone remembers that RSPS then I love you!

Rune-x-scape was an old 317 style classic server depending on which server you are on about…

Updated the site and added xp modes for accounts for example: extreme hard easy

Read full topic

item.title: Rune-X-Scape! Reborn!
item.dc:creator: @haviland4 haviland4
item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

[quote=“Soulcist, post:3, topic:551414”]The name as said above isn’t necessary, but that’s meh. As for the rest of this thread you’re showing off, I’m not really intriguied to say the least. The content shown is pretty bland from what I’m seeing here and I’m not really pleased to see that homepage.

You have a weird background for the homepage that doesn’t blend well with the others, a weird slideshow that doesn’t make much sense to have with a RSPS homepage, the font and color scheme of the navigational bar makes it a bit hard to see for the homepage or at least notice, and the news and character information’s borders and what not do not match the rest of the homepage. Also, that crown used is very pixelated while the information shown shouldn’t appear until a player is logged in. You should make it show it asks a user their information then reloads the page and finally shows that information.

Finally, the very bottom where you have your “copyright” at shows ‘PKLegacy’.[/quote]

i agree with the website i have been working on a site this is only a temp template i kinda hate the layout and the slideshow pictures are default

with the server maybe you could give me an example of what players want ingame

Read full topic

item.title: Rune-X-Scape! Reborn!
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

The name as said above isn’t necessary, but that’s meh. As for the rest of this thread you’re showing off, I’m not really intriguied to say the least. The content shown is pretty bland from what I’m seeing here and I’m not really pleased to see that homepage.

You have a weird background for the homepage that doesn’t blend well with the others, a weird slideshow that doesn’t make much sense to have with a RSPS homepage, the font and color scheme of the navigational bar makes it a bit hard to see for the homepage or at least notice, and the news and character information’s borders and what not do not match the rest of the homepage. Also, that crown used is very pixelated while the information shown shouldn’t appear until a player is logged in. You should make it show it asks a user their information then reloads the page and finally shows that information.

Finally, the very bottom where you have your “copyright” at shows ‘PKLegacy’.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune-X-Scape! Reborn!
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

It seems alright, other than the name. “Rune-X-Scape”? Really?

Goodjob with this and goodluck.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune-X-Scape! Reborn!
item.dc:creator: @haviland4 haviland4
item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

[center][b]

Play now at www.rune-x-scape.com

Hey everyone many of you know of two types of rune-x-scape

We had a rune-x-scape ran by chris for a couple of months which had a player base of 20-30 players daily.

Then we had a rune-x-scape ran by domain .net or .org which was a deathlypvpz base but edited.

Pk-Legacy has bought out rune-x-scape domain and files which will now be professional coded together which hopefully will make a successful server

ingame content of both servers will be added over the next couple of weeks which will be applying as system updates

Play now at www.rune-x-scape.com

Fixes
Mute system - easy fix but many PI’s dont have :S
Zamorak Godwars bosses - animations work so they no longer flicker
Made client window non resizable
fixed remove X dupe method
fixed some memory leak issues (not 100% but is much better) - See printscreen
fixed some of items equiping to wrong slot and showing incorrectly (pvp armours)
fixed the logout glitch at duel arena where it would spam the server when you logged out

Additions
Kalphite queen with working animations
working points system (slayer/pking/boss killing to earn points)
working tokul shops
kill/death ratio with counters in the quest tab
quick chat fully working where it doesnt say “0 hans” when you have no task
Edgeville home with all alters and shop
added working zamorak brews + magic potions and custom "combat potion"
re-coded commands file, added lots of new commands and neatnd the file up however still needs some tidying
fully working exp lamps
use “agility top” on agility npc’s for exp bonuses (can be bought with agility tickets)
added 3 agility courses (gnome, barbarian and wilderness)
added lots of teleports

FULL SCREEN CLIENT
A Agility Shop with interfaces for tickets.
All Skills Level To 125
Working Auras in-game
Fixed Minigames
Better Combat
Working MoneyPouch!
Summoning Orb With Draining
Fixed Cheat Egine Dupe!
custom items with 711 model header
[Server] Announcement when you get 99
[Server] Announcement when you receive a rage drop
Custom GFX and Anime for some basic commands
Lottery, [Lottie]
Added 2 Starters Per Ip
Added Custom Log-ins when Staff Log in
120 Dungeoneering
Server AutoSave
No Bank Lag
Player Titles
Auto-Server Save
Re-Wrote Mage
Added in dice command for Donator+
New Interfaces
Comp Cape requireing all 99s.
New Superdonator Extreme Donator Rank
Better Duel Arena
New ::Help method
Better Prayer
Better Eco
2b Ticket Exchange
Nice Player Titles With a good Interface
Player Titles for most ranks
Player Cliping
Summoning Working
Fixed Charms
Better Spirit Shields (Not showing lines like regualr ones)
Staff Tab saying if staff is online or not.
Most Sinlge and Double doors working the way they need to
Awesome Donator Benifits
Fixed Freezing in Wise old man
And LOADS OF MORE THINGS!

[/b][/center]

Read full topic
